channel.title: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!
channel.description:
Hi, guys i'm new to this forum this is my first post.
have to have windows xp for this:
right click on desktop >properties >appearance >effects
where it says "use following method to smooth edges of screen font" choose ClearType
notice everything will look alot clearer and nicer!
if it doesnt download this: http://download.microsoft.com/download/b/7/0/b7019730-0fa3-47a9-a159-98b80c185aad/setup.exe
it will let you adjust cleartype. i recommend you get it anyway!
tell me if you like it! enjoy.....

item.title: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!
item.dc:creator: @Oshashumashu Oshashumashu
item.description:
@Oshashumashu wrote:

It does not make the text blurry. I set it to standard and then cleartype. It only looks blurry because you are used to the standard setting.

Read full topic

also
right click>
properties>
settings>
advanced>
monitor>
refresh rate>
highest as possible.

item.title: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

The reason being modern graphics drivers often have such things built in and enabled already.

I also believe your monitor has some part to play in these sorts of things, It’s best to find out which setting is more clear and quite simply stick with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!

item.title: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!

@shpoanator wrote:

I turned mine on and it was all blurry and added shadows. Also the text seemed closer together. It’s better left off.

item.title: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

This added a shadow to all my text :S

It was set on “Standard” before, which seems to look the best. Cool though, I never noticed that effects button before lol.

item.source: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!

item.title: Make Firefox, text and everything on your computer alot clearer!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

goatee:

You’re all probably turning it off. It’s on automatically as Davidude said so there really is no point in reading this tutoril unless you have already blurry text.

Nah, I was definitely turning it on. I’ve always had all of my visual effects options turned off in the system properties, so I’m used to the sharp and accurate text (which is what I prefer).

Read full topic
